data.title: The Ultrastar Deluxe Open Source Project on Open Hub : News Page
data.text:
Posted about 8 years ago by Stefan L.

tldr: download link of version 1.3-beta: https://github.com/UltraStar-Deluxe/USDX/releases/tag/v1.3.2-beta Today marks the start of a great era,.... oh wait, we already had that kind of saying in an announcement a couple of years ago and it was ... [More] also announced that future versions would be released more frequently. Well, open source development happened and for some reason development almost ceased. Anyways, the developers of UltraStar Deluxe and all the many contributors from various forks finally released a new version of the game last weekend. We marked it as a beta version because it still contains a bunch of minor known bugs, but in our opinion it is already much more stable than any other version of USDX out there. The stable version should be released within the next year or so. So, feel free to download UltraStar Deluxe 1.3-beta from https://github.com/UltraStar-Deluxe/USDX/releases and enjoy singing your favorite songs! Summary of changes: 6 player support on one or split over two screens jukebox mode battle of the bands party tournament mode webcam support support for almost any video or audio file format the game now runs on windows xp up to windows 10, OS X up to el capitain and many linux distributions duet singing of songs many new keyboard shortcuts greatly improved song editor improved overall speed and lowered memory requirements - you can now easily play the game with 5000 songs * loaded on a system with 1 GB of ram smart search feature for song selection switched from SDL1.2 to SDL2, updated many other dependent libraries better Unicode support for multilingual characters in lyrics less bugs and improved overall stability lots more Please report new issues/problems/suggestions at https://github.com/UltraStar-Deluxe/USDX/issues For a list of keyboard shortcuts / controls, see https://github.com/UltraStar-Deluxe/USDX/blob/master/README.md#4-controls Instructions on how to build&run the game on linux based systems can be found at https://github.com/UltraStar-Deluxe/USDX/blob/master/README.md#5-build-and-run . If you know how to build packages for various distributions, please contact and help us! [Less]
